attributes.action: Put more in place for children with special educational needs
attributes.additional_details: Put our children first and more funding into supporting them not all children fit the same bracket more needs to be done so our children don’t suffer each and every child is entitled to a education
attributes.background: Support children in getting an education with special educational needs not enough is being done and our children are suffering more parents are having to home school there children because there is no place for them in a mainstream school they are made to feel they don’t fit in

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701409
